SEARCH
Package io.github.lycoriscafe.nexus.http.core.headers.cors

Class CORSResponse

java.lang.Object
io.github.lycoriscafe.nexus.http.core.headers.cors.CORSResponse
public final class CORSResponse extends Object
Cross Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) for HTTP responses. 
     
     // Example code
     var cors = new CORSResponse()
          .setAccessControlAllowOrigin("someOrigin");
Since:
v1.0.0
See Also:
  • HttpResponse
